data.title: 2024 Best Places to Live in Burnet County, TX
meta_keywords: best places to live in Burnet County
data.meta_description: Explore the best places to live in Burnet County based on crime, public schools, cost of living, real estate, and local amenities.
data.text:

Town in Texas ,

Featured Review: Current Resident says Burnet is a very small town with around 5,000 people living here. One thing I do like about burnet is the community. The community always comes together to help others! There are also beautiful... .
